They are given a limited budget and just six months to turn it into a modern family home fit for the 21st century

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Simon OBrien, Tayo Oguntonade and Carys Davies buy two strangers a house at auction and give them a renovation budget and just months to flip it. In Colwyn Bay, north Wales, joiner Gethin teams up with musician Jacob to renovate a house that hasnt been touched since the day it was built. These two have their work cut out as they take on an ambitious renovation with just six months and a limited budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Essex couple Belinda and Alan have decided to take the leap and buy a property in or around the pretty seaside resort of La Cala de Mijas in Spains Costa del Sol. They call upon the expertise of Laura Hamilton, who finds five options to show them within their £160,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman shows five properties to Pat and David, who have been married for 44 years and are selling up in Northampton to move to Portugals Silver Coast

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In north Surrey, planning enforcement officer Becky is joined by singing teacher Petrina, drum teacher Rob, solicitor Shoba and building company boss Giovanni. Becky plans to delight her guests with an evening of modern home-cooking and a menu including butternut, lamb and a deconstructed apple dessert. The week gets off to an intriguing start with young gun Rob taking a shine to Petrina and vice versa

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Solicitor Shoba hosts the second night in north Surrey, and tries to impress with an Indian-themed menu. However, the guests are less than impressed with the food, especially the main course - a curry made from frozen fish - but will a bit of belly dancing, Bollywood-style, help save the day? Meanwhile, singer Petrina and drummer Rob continue their flirting both at and away from the table

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Drum tutor Rob hosts the third night in north Surrey, hoping his Thai-themed menu will impress his guests, as well as the object of his affections, Petrina. He serves prawns with lemon, lime and chilli for his starter, Thai chicken curry for his main, and rounds off with his own take on an ice-cream sundae. As a single man living in his stepmothers house, Rob thinks his competitors will see him as an underdog, so is intent on pulling out all the stops

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Singing teacher Petrina hosts the fourth dinner party in north Surrey, and she believes her experience of entertaining on cruise ships will give her the edge as she plans a showstopper of an evening. However, the diners seem more interested in their hosts continued flirting with fellow guest Rob. Will tonight be the night, or will he shy away when he discovers Petrina has sung in the West End and worked with dozens of household names?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Giovanni hosts the final night of the competition in north Surrey, intent on flying the flag for Sicily with some family inspired recipes. Even with help from his father, a tagliatelle tragedy leaves him with Parmesan on his face. Becky is less than impressed with Giovannis dishes, and matters go from bad to worse when he attempts to serve his home-made pasta. However, poor food doesnt deter a romantic Rob from popping the question to Petrina, sending shockwaves across the dining room. In a final attempt to bag the £1,000, Giovanni invites an opera singer to liven up the proceedings, but his musical initiative may prove too little to save the day

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at Village Limits in Woodhall Spa, Lincolnshire, where owner David Coulam and best friend Kim Goodman hope their quirky rooms will propel them to victory

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the week is to the Old Mill in Yarm in the Tees Valley, where mother and daughter Zoe and Mea Walton hope to win over their rivals with the life of luxury. The guests are impressed, although the extra cost for the deluxe room, with its own hot tub, does not wash well with Spencer and Gavin

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The rivals spend a night at the Elan Hotel in Rhayader, Powys, where Martin McDaid and Iris Anderson provide plenty of chat and a no-frills approach. However, Spencer and Gavin are not big fans of going back to basics, the rooms lack the wow factor for the guests and a deluge of dust leaves Spencer feeling wiped out

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to the Royal Oak Inn, in Luxborough, Somerset, run by Spencer Braydon-Phillips, who is joined in the competition by his good friend Gavin Rees. The guests arrive to the 14th-century inn with high expectations, but are shocked to find the standards to be fairly ordinary. In the bar, competition talk turns tense and boiler troubles overnight pour cold water on the guests stays.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final day of the competition finds the hosts meet for the last time to find out how much theyve been paid and to settle some scores. The guests rifle through their feedback, from troubles over breakfast hampers and hot tub rooms to interesting decor decisions. One hosts tit-for-tat approach also comes under scrutiny. The BandBers also get to the bottom of why one guest refused a return visit. After strong opinions are aired and differences debated, the payments are revealed and the winner is announced

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Chiropractor Steph Wilson and her husband Alex build a contemporary, cantilevered farmhouse on farmlands once owned by her grandfather in Herefordshire. The couple are told their ambitious design will cost £500,000, twice as much as they can borrow, but the pair decide to take a leap of faith and move into a draughty old caravan on site as they begin working on their new home

programme.title: Sandi Toksvigs Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Sandi takes her first ever trip to Hadrians Wall in Northumberland to discover what life would have been like for the soldiers, their families, the traders and enslaved people at the edge of the Roman Empire almost 2000 years ago. At the nearby site of Vindolanda, Sandi helps clean a massive size 14 boot, discovered in one of Magna Forts defensive ditches

programme.title: Secrets of Chinas Forbidden City
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the Beijing palace that housed Chinese emperors for 600 years. The programme reveals the current conservation work being carried out and uncovers new details about past rulers, including trade with Europe and how a marble staircase was transported along an ice road. A scale model is used to demonstrate how the structure was built to withstand earthquakes

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: The AandE staff of Kings College Hospital in London treat patients involved in accidents, including a construction worker who broke his leg in three places and suffered injuries to his chest after being trapped under a cherry picker. Plus, a man who fell from a ladder and landed on his head, and a widower who had a nasty encounter with a mandoline while chopping vegetables

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: How UPS Flight 6 faced disaster when a fire on board left the cockpit full of smoke, incapacitatating the captain. Unable to see his instruments, the first officer had to improvise

programme.title: Engineering Europe

programme.title: Lost Ships of WW2
programme.sub-title: Lady Lex: Queen of the Coral Sea
programme.desc: The USS Lexington birthed naval aviation and was victorious in the first carrier-to-carrier battle during the Second World War. Hours later, it erupted in flames due to enemy fire. Now, after 80 years, the Petrel crew hopes to spot the wreck and the planes that went down with her

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: How the Japanese army turned to ancient warrior traditions during the battle of Saipan - a conflict where defeat would place US aircraft dangerously close to their home country

programme.title: Destruction Decoded

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The 1987 fire at Kings Cross tube station, in which 31 people were killed when a match was discarded on a wooden escalator - despite a smoking ban two years previously. Initially small and containable, it became a fatal flashover and ranked as the worst blaze in the history of the London Underground

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation

Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The experts take on the restoration of a kids drum kit from the 1920s that has been beaten into submission, a vintage oil lamp and a 100-year-old fret saw. Presented by Jay Blades

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Sarah Moore rescues another selection of items from the recycling centre, giving a little green chair to upholsterer Simion Hawtin-Smith and a dated display cabinet to upholsterer Katie Keat, while she transforms a pair of school chairs

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help more people to reunite with long-lost relatives. Alice Jones was brought up by her father, but on a visit to her mother more than 50 years ago she met her younger brother called Sam and has always hoped that one day she would see him again. Mark Ratcliffe grew up in Lancashire and at the age of 12 his parents told him he was adopted and the revelation devastated him. Ever since, he cannot shake the question of how a mother could give up her child and is now looking for answers

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: A collectable piggy bank called Wesley goes under Anguss gavel. Plus, a family wants to sell a war hero relatives rare SAS badges

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Izzie Balmer and James Braxton take a tour of south-east England, along the way encountering items including a potters wheel, before an auction in Tring, Hertfordshire

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Izzie Balmer and James Braxton take a tour of Northamptonshire and Bedfordshire. Items up for sale include a ring made of lava from Mount Vesuvius and depleted uranium glassware

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Childhood toys and a coin collection need to be sold to pay for a widows home costs, and a downsize means some risque art needs to go under the hammer

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team help celebrities clear their homes of clutter. They look for hidden gems to be auctioned off for profit

programme.title: Johnny Vegas Little Shop of Antiques
programme.desc: Its opening day at Vintage Vegas, and Johnnys dream is a reality! Johnny and Bev have never run a shop, and the pressures on to attract customers

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Sarah Readings presents a very well-loved and very well-travelled companion in need of help from soft toy experts Amanda Middleditch and Julie Tatchell. This little doll of a sailor was named Fairstar after the ship he was bought on, and the ship that carried Sarah and her parents to Australia in the 1960s as Ten Pound Poms - people encouraged to emigrate to Australia by the government with cheap fares. A mid-century camera and a childs musical chair are also rejuvenated

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Lucy inherited her fathers property and hopes to give it to son Ben. But neither of them can step foot inside after experiencing inexplicable horror

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Emma is harassed by spirits. One sinister spirit is Shadow Man, and he wont give her up without a fight, so Ian takes extreme measures to save her

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard visits a salvage yard in Cheshire containing vintage gym equipment with real muscle. At an antique shop on the south coast, he spots some decorative religious moulds

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard visits a country estate mentioned in the Domesday Book, unearths a cupboard that has been unopened for decades and finds a weathervane dating to 1800

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea
programme.desc: Jenni Falconer helps a couple find their dream property on the North Yorkshire coast

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Auctioneers Charles Hanson and Raj Bisram take their Triumph through Somerset, Dorset and Hampshire before ending at an auction in Swanmore

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard visits a warehouse in York, finds a dreamy black beetle at a specialist garage in Cambridgeshire, and an antiques dealer in Suffolk has a delightful model castle

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard hunts for interesting items at Britains largest private residence, and stumbles upon quirky head carvings and a tartan design in honour of Elvis Presley

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard heads to Derbyshire where a props business is home to a slew of oversize industrial antiques and a few must-have gems. Later, a salvage yard features some amazing finds

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion and Mark Staceys adventure continues in the Cotswolds, where he discovers a rural idyll that inspired a novel while Christina learns about a war hero

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: An unusual piece of sporting history arrives for the attention of silversmith Brenton West and leather expert Suzie Fletcher - a decorative belt awarded to a Victorian speed walker. A 1950s metal mobo roundabout and a dented trumpet are also restored. Presented by Jay Blades

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Audio expert Mark restores a vintage jukebox that holds fond memories for widower Jeff. Plus, silversmith Brenton navigates his way through an old compass

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Presenter Jay Blades enlists the help of designer Sarah Peterson to give two side tables a stylish new look, while lighting expert Duncan McKean attempts to give two old record players a radical overhaul. For his own project, Jay attempts to make some money for nothing from two farmhouse stools. Narrated by Arthur Smith

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help more people to reunite with long-lost relatives. Martin Smith grew up in Rochdale and had a happy childhood, but struggled with intense feelings of rejection when he discovered he was adopted and only now feels ready to face his fears and find his birth mother. Anne Jordan always knew she was adopted and has been searching for her birth mother for over 30 years, but she will not set a date for her wedding to fiance Chris until she has found her

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus needs to sell some wild west costumes. And a widower’s unfashionable furniture needs to make big money so he can be reunited with his family

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Izzie Balmer and James Braxton head to Lincolnshire, Cambridgeshire and Bedfordshire. James tries out a local delicacy and Izzie tries her hand at a winter sport

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Izzie Balmer and James Braxtons penultimate leg takes them to Lowestoft and Cromer. Along the way, Izzie is charmed by a snake and an art deco necklace, while James goes crabbing and gets all fired up by a cannonball. But who will come out on top at auction in Banbury?

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: A cancer survivor wants to sell his beloved whisky collection for a good cause. And a huge decorative pot is the surprise draw on auction day

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follow the stories of foundlings as they search for answers about why they were left as babies and try to find their birth families. A man left on a strangers doorstep finds out a painful family secret, while a woman discovered in the back of an Aston Martin car in the 1950s finally understands the reason why she was there

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follow the story of reunited siblings Geoffrey Tonks and Barbara Jacobs as they investigate a family mystery and try to trace a missing sister on Geoffreys fathers side. They also catch up with Robert Lindsay, who explores the difficulties of building a father/son relationship so late in life, and brother and sister Nicholas Rhoades and Cayley Cox talk about how they have already experienced an enormous amount together in the year that has passed since they met for the first time

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Cathy Hodd has a remote-control model battleship built from scratch for her by her grandfather. She turns to model expert David Burville to help restore it to its former glory. Other items seeking some much-needed attention include a Victorian garden watering syringe and an electrical meter that belonged to someone dear. Presented by Jay Blades

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: The return of the award-winning mystery drama. The Monterey Five bond together as they pick up the pieces of their shattered lives. Meanwhile, Celestes deceased husband Perrys grieving mother Mary Louise arrives in town, looking for answers regarding her sons death. Starring Reese Witherspoon and Nicole Kidman

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Munch and Gee investigate a hit-and-run case which brings back memories of Vietnam to Gharty, who identifies the victim by a tattoo and a knife in his possession. Police drama, starring Peter Gerety

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A ritual murder is staged on the Internet and the next day the body is found. Sheppard teams up with Bayliss to catch the killer but he proves a tough nut to crack

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Cersei and Tywin plot the next move for the Lannisters and the Crown after Tommens coronation, while Ser Jorah gives Daenerys worrying news about the situations in Yunkai and Astapor. Jon and his band of volunteers mount a raid on the mutineers at Crasters Keep, and Sansa and Littlefinger arrive at the Eyrie. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey, Charles Dance, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos arrive in Braavos for their meeting with the Iron Bank, but find Tycho Nestoris (Mark Gatiss) a hard man to do business with. Yara Greyjoy leads a band of Ironborn on a mission to rescue her brother Theon, while Daenerys meets with supplicants in Meereen. In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Naples descends into chaos as Gennys war against the Levantes resumes - and an unexpected revelation changes everything. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: In Riga, Genny and Ciro meet again and things get emotional, but both have changed and it remains to be seen if they will be able to reconnect. In Italian

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.sub-title: The Great Swirling Apparatus of Our Planets Function
programme.desc: After their efforts are rejected by Chief Bowers, the kids must deal with their disappointment and a series of increasingly terrifying experiences. As General Shaw escalates his efforts to find answers, Charlotte tries to advocate for a reluctant Hank, who worries his secret will get out. Urged on by the Patty Cakes, Marge pulls a mean-spirited prank on Lilly

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Paulie organises the annual Feast of St Elzear, but his thrifty nature almost ruins the occasion. Christopher makes a surprise announcement, before he and Tony get involved in a shoot-out with a gang of bikers. Carmela tells Liz La Cerva who she thinks was responsible for Adrianas death. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Lucas becomes immersed in a new Banshee crisis involving a vicious serial murderer. The drama returns for a fourth series, starring Antony Starr

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion enlists an unlikely ally, while Daario entreats Daenerys to allow him to do what he does best. Jons warnings about the Walls vulnerability fall on deaf ears, while Brienne and Pod follow a new lead as they continues their mission to track down the Stark girls. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions fate is decided as his champion Oberyn Martell faces against Gregor the Mountain Clegane in his trial by combat, while Moles Town is on the receiving end of a raid by the wildlings. Ramsay sends Theon into Moat Cailin to negotiate the surrender of the Ironborn troops holding the fort, Littlefinger and Sansa are questioned about the circumstances surrounding Lysas death and Barristan confronts Jorah about a document delivered to him. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Pedro Pascal

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: August arrives and the fishermen of Brixham spend time ashore with their families as their boats are repaired - but summer proves costly for Jan, who loses £1,000 for every day his vessel is out of action. Apprentice deckhand Logan has to decide whether a life at sea is the right choice for him and his family, and seafood seller Jenny receives a surprise on her 65th birthday

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: An ex-Marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honour when he is forced to work for the Mob. Action thriller directed by Jesse V Johnson, starring Bruce Willis, Olga Kurylenko, John Malkovich and Michael Rooker

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: A professional hitman lets his emotional detachment slip when his mentor is murdered, and puts his deadly skills to the task of getting revenge. The solitary assassin finds an ally in his teachers son, who also yearns for vengeance and persuades the killer to teach him the tricks of the trade. Action thriller remake, starring Jason Statham, Ben Foster and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: During the 14th century, William Tell defends his family and his homeland of Switzerland after the Austrian King invades. Historical drama, starring Claes Bang, Connor Swindells, Ben Kingsley and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A Trojan prince elopes with the king of Spartas wife, sparking a bitter and bloody war between a mighty alliance of Greek kings and the city of Troy, whose champion engages in intense personal conflict with the enemys most formidable warrior. Wolfgang Petersens adventure, inspired by Homers epic poem The Iliad, with Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom, Brian Cox, Sean Bean and Peter OToole

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: A warlord in ancient China sends out messengers throughout his kingdom to declare a reward for whoever can kill three assassins intent on murdering him. In response, a warrior arrives at the rulers palace and claims that he has already defeated the would-be killers, but his story does not quite ring true. Martial arts adventure, starring Jet Li, Tony Leung Chiu Wai and Maggie Cheung Man-Yuk. In Mandarin

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantiss fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his fathers death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Youngster Billy Batson is chosen by the ancient wizard Shazam as his new champion, and receives various superpowers. Together with his best friend Freddy Freeman, Billy must come to terms with his new talents in order to stop the evil Dr Thaddeus Sivana. Comedy adventure based on the Captain Marvel and Shazam comics, starring Zachary Levi, Mark Strong and Asher Angel

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the others identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bays action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Marcus Garan is a part of a group of hitmen who are contracted to take out a notorious killer, only to find out theyre being hunted. Writer/director Kevin Greviouxs action thriller, starring Frank Grillo, Alain Moussi, Marie Avgeropoulos and Stephen Dorff

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Youngster Billy Batson is chosen by the ancient wizard Shazam as his new champion, and receives various superpowers. Together with his best friend Freddy Freeman, Billy must come to terms with his new talents in order to stop the evil Dr Thaddeus Sivana. Comedy adventure based on the Captain Marvel and Shazam comics, starring Zachary Levi, Mark Strong and Asher Angel

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution. After killing the street thug who was directly responsible for her death, he finds himself in the middle of a war with the dead mans brother, who is equally hell-bent on getting even. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis and Thomas Jane

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Exorcist John Constantine is cursed with the ability to see spirits stalking the Earth, and grudgingly takes on the forces of evil, hoping his actions will earn him a place in heaven. However, he is told he has terminal cancer and time for salvation is running out - unless a policewoman investigating her twin sisters death can find the key to saving his soul. Supernatural thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz and Tilda Swinton

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots and their human allies face a confrontation with their original creator, who has brainwashed their leader and intends to save her own home planet by destroying Earth. To save the human race they must recover an ancient artefact from Arthurian legend - but their mission is threatened by old enemies as they uncover a terrible secret about the history of the world. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg, Anthony Hopkins, Gemma Chan, Stanley Tucci and John Turturro

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantis is ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a huge army at his command, he plans to conquer the oceanic people before taking on the rest of the world. Arthur Curry, Orms half-brother and the human-raised heir to Atlantis, embarks on a globetrotting quest to stop him. But a ruthless mercenary is on his trail, seeking revenge. Superhero adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Nicole Kidman and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: A battle-hardened special forces operative attempts to rescue his kidnapped niece when a mercenary mission spirals into chaos. Action thriller, starring Eden Brolin, Andy Garcia and Melissa Leo

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution. After killing the street thug who was directly responsible for her death, he finds himself in the middle of a war with the dead mans brother, who is equally hell-bent on getting even. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis and Thomas Jane

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!
programme.desc: The bungling leader of a band of inept buccaneers is determined to prove his worth to his rivals and win the coveted Pirate of the Year award. An encounter with the naturalist Charles Darwin gives him the chance to pull off a daring crime - if he can survive coming face to face with the pirate-hating Queen Victoria. Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton and David Tennant

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: A tap-dancing penguin goes searching for his missing son, but his search leads him to discover a drifting iceberg that threatens to destroy his colony. He sets out to unite all the birds in the Antarctic to avert the catastrophe. Animated musical comedy sequel, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Ava Acres and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: A young penguin disappoints his fellow seabirds with his inability to sing - but instead he displays a remarkable talent for tap dancing. However, his elders refuse to accept this outlandish behaviour and send the youngster into exile, marking the start of a wonderful journey. Animated adventure, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: A reformed criminal mastermind who has abandoned his wicked ways for a life of fatherhood and jam-making helps a secret agent to bring one of his fellow evil geniuses to justice. The villain in question has stolen a dangerous experimental serum with the power to turn harmless animals into ravening monsters. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: The grumpy ogre longs for his simple life as a feared monster, so strikes a deal with magical trickster Rumpelstiltskin to get back to the way things were. However, he soon finds there is a catch - he ends up stuck in an alternate world where none of his friends know who he is and where Rumpelstiltskin has become the kingdoms tyrannical ruler. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren steals the Book of Legends to locate the Trident of Atlantis so she can reign supreme over the ocean. Animation with the voice of Yvette Nicole Brown

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase, and for centuries the noblemans ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American father Hiram B Otis moves into the country pile with his family, and daughter Virginia forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to the States. Animated adventure with the voices of Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of childrens books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: When their fiendish foes unite against them once more, Batman and Robin attempt to take them down. Animated adventure, with the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward and Julie Newmar, reprising their roles from the 1960s live action series

programme.title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
programme.desc: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the legendary Megaloceros Giganteus, who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life. Family animation, with the voices of Sam Hardy, Hannah Herman Cortes, Pierce Brosnan and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: The grumpy ogre longs for his simple life as a feared monster, so strikes a deal with magical trickster Rumpelstiltskin to get back to the way things were. However, he soon finds there is a catch - he ends up stuck in an alternate world where none of his friends know who he is and where Rumpelstiltskin has become the kingdoms tyrannical ruler. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: A reformed criminal mastermind who has abandoned his wicked ways for a life of fatherhood and jam-making helps a secret agent to bring one of his fellow evil geniuses to justice. The villain in question has stolen a dangerous experimental serum with the power to turn harmless animals into ravening monsters. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: A woman is exposed to radiation from a meteorite that causes her to grow to an enormous size during her wedding. She is captured by the military and held prisoner with an assortment of strange creatures - but when aliens invade, these freaks of nature are the only ones capable of saving the world. Animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Reese Witherspoon and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a cars exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his towns weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of childrens books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash traps The Flash in a time loop so he is forced to relive the same day

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: When their fiendish foes unite against them once more, Batman and Robin attempt to take them down. Animated adventure, with the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward and Julie Newmar, reprising their roles from the 1960s live action series

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Magical beings from folklore, including Santa Claus, Jack Frost and the Easter Bunny, join forces to defeat the plans of an evil spirit, who intends to steal the dreams of children and use the power they grant him to dominate the world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chris Pine, Alec Baldwin, Hugh Jackman, Isla Fisher and Jude Law

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A primary school teacher enters his class in a Song for Christmas competition, and ends up having to lead the busload of excitable kids - as well as his irresponsible teaching assistant - on a disastrous trip to Wales for the event. The journey also leads to an unwanted confrontation with his high-flying twin brother. Comedy sequel, starring David Tennant, Marc Wootton, Joanna Page and Jessica Hynes

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude, Wheres My Donkey?!
programme.desc: The pupils of St Bernadettes face a new challenge as Christmas approaches, when their new teacher loses his memory, forgetting everything about the festive season and that he is about to get married. It falls to the kids, led by excitable teacher Mr Poppy, to help him remember both in time for the wedding. Comedy sequel, starring Martin Clunes, Catherine Tate, Marc Wootton and Celia Imrie

programme.title: Surviving Christmas
programme.desc: A millionaire feels unfulfilled in spite of his great fortune. He decides a traditional family Christmas is the thing that is missing from his life, so he hires a family to spend the season of goodwill with him. Unfortunately, the plan goes haywire with the arrival of an unexpected guest. Comedy, starring Ben Affleck, James Gandolfini, Christina Applegate and Catherine OHara

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: A retired mechanic who lost his wife a year earlier invites his daughters and sons to his house for a traditional celebration. However, its not long before they start arguing, seemingly scuppering his chances of a happy Christmas. Comedy, starring Danny Glover, Romany Malco and MoNique

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: A woman moves in with her brother and his family after her latest break-up. She begins a relationship with a drug dealer who babysits the couples two-year-old son, while also trying to persuade her sister-in-law that she needs to try and get more out of her life. Comedy drama, starring Anna Kendrick, Melanie Lynskey and Lena Dunham

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A New York borough is shut down during a blizzard - and a group of cheeky local children steal a snowplough in a desperate attempt to ensure the roads to their school stay closed as long as possible. Meanwhile, parents all over the city struggle to work out what to do with their offspring. Comedy, starring Chris Elliott, Mark Webber, Jean Smart, Chevy Chase, Iggy Pop, Pam Grier and Zena Grey

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas
programme.desc: Two unhappy youngsters search out a department store Santa Claus, desperate for him to grant their wish of reuniting their parents before their mother marries her new boyfriend. Drama, starring Leslie Nielsen, Thora Birch, Jamey Sheridan, Harley Jane Kozak, Lauren Bacall and Kevin Nealon

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: Surviving Christmas
programme.desc: A millionaire feels unfulfilled in spite of his great fortune. He decides a traditional family Christmas is the thing that is missing from his life, so he hires a family to spend the season of goodwill with him. Unfortunately, the plan goes haywire with the arrival of an unexpected guest. Comedy, starring Ben Affleck, James Gandolfini, Christina Applegate and Catherine OHara

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Convict Rudy learns his cellmate has a girlfriend on the outside who he has only ever communicated with by letter. When the romantic inmate is killed in a riot and Rudy is paroled, he decides to track this woman down and assume the dead mans identity. However, his deception draws him into a casino robbery being orchestrated by her crazed brother. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron and Gary Sinise

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A teenager is given a strange, cute creature as a Christmas present by his eccentric father and warned to keep it away from water, not to feed it after midnight, or expose it to direct light. However, a chance dousing causes the furball to spawn a horde of murderous little monsters, and their devilish antics bring mayhem to a small town. Comedy horror, with Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton and Polly Holliday

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: An American family fulfil their dream of moving back to Norway after inheriting a cabin in the mountains, but soon encounter dark forces. Festive comedy horror, starring Martin Starr, Amrita Acharia and Kiran Shah

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: A boy is left disillusioned with Christmas as his dysfunctional family spend the holiday arguing. They must soon learn to work together if they are to see New Year, when a monstrous demon appears, intent on punishing them for their lack of festive spirit - and which has the power to make the houses Christmas decorations take on murderous life. Comedy horror, starring Toni Collette and Emjay Anthony

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: While heading home, Hawthorne College student Lindsey is impaled with an icicle by a masked individual. Its the beginning of a bloodthirsty rampage, prompting Riley Stone and her friends to fight back. Co-writer/director Sophia Takals horror remake, starring Imogen Poots, Lily Donoghue, Aleyse Shannon and Brittany OGrady

programme.title: The Christmas Movie Countdown
programme.desc: The nations favourite festive film is revealed as Simon Callow presents a countdown of the top 25 as voted for by the public

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking teenager Daniel accompanies his venerable mentor Mr Miyagi when he returns to the Japanese province of Okinawa to visit his dying father. However, an old rival of Miyagis is waiting for them, while Daniel is drawn into a vicious conflict with their enemys own karate protege. Martial arts sequel, starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Yuji Okumoto

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A drilling operation unleashes a subterranean creature which feeds on oil. The monster bonds with a monster truck which a local teenager is building from spare parts, and the youngster befriends the beast and helps it to return to its underground home. Fantasy adventure, starring Lucas Till and Jane Levy

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young heros quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Endes novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: The teenage martial arts expert becomes obsessed with defending his championship title, but wise mentor Mr Miyagi is not prepared to help him fight for such a shallow goal. Seeking someone else to help guide his career, he falls under the influence of a crooked trainer - who is secretly plotting his downfall with the help of an old adversary. Adventure sequel, starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: British wizard Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York City with a bagful of magical creatures as part of a global study of fantastic beasts, but gets caught up in a conflict when some of the creatures in his care are accidentally released after an inadvertent switching of suitcases with a baker. With a strange, dark force terrorising the Big Apple, Newt needs to find some allies to help him round up the beasts, while saving his own skin in the meantime. Harry Potter prequel written for the screen by JK Rowling, starring Eddie Redmayne, with Katherine Waterston, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Jon Voight, Dan Fogler and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: In 1927, the Magical Congress of the United States of America transfers the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald to Europe to stand trial, but he escapes. In an attempt to scupper the evil sorcerers plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander to help. Second part of JK Rowlings Harry Potter prequel saga, starring Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp, Katherine Waterston and Jude Law

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes discover their arch enemy Shredder has returned from another dimension, and made a deal with an alien warlord. Assisted by two mutant henchman, Shredder goes in search of a lost device that will allow his new ally to mount an invasion of Earth. Action adventure sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Stephen Amell

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes discover their arch enemy Shredder has returned from another dimension, and made a deal with an alien warlord. Assisted by two mutant henchman, Shredder goes in search of a lost device that will allow his new ally to mount an invasion of Earth. Action adventure sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Stephen Amell

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: In 1927, the Magical Congress of the United States of America transfers the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald to Europe to stand trial, but he escapes. In an attempt to scupper the evil sorcerers plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander to help. Second part of JK Rowlings Harry Potter prequel saga, starring Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp, Katherine Waterston and Jude Law

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: American football player Joe gets snatched away to the afterlife following his death, but the angel responsible realises too late he was supposed to survive. Joe is offered the chance to return to the land of the living by taking over the body of a murdered millionaire - to the shock of the dead mans killers. Fantasy drama, starring Warren Beatty, Julie Christie and James Mason

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Racial tensions erupt in a Brooklyn neighbourhood on the hottest day of the summer. The simmering conflicts centre on the Italian-owned local pizza parlour, as a minor dispute gradually escalates into full-blown violence. Drama, directed by and starring Spike Lee, with Danny Aiello, John Turturro, Ossie Davis, Rosie Perez and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: A writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubricks horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. But bit by bit, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each others lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowes romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: A writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubricks horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Nov 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: Acclaimed Japanese director Akira Kurosawas Oscar-winning thriller focusing on three eyewitnesses highly personal accounts of a rape and murder, which reveal the true characters and frailties of those involved. Toshiro Mifune, Machiko Kyo and Masayuki Mori star

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowes romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Youngster Dorothy Gale is whisked over the rainbow by a tornado into the magical land of Oz, where she inadvertently kills a wicked witch - incurring the wrath of another. Setting out to find the wizard who can show her a way home, she is joined on her journey by a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who all hope their own wishes will be granted. Musical fantasy, with Judy Garland, Ray Bolger, Jack Haley, Bert Lahr and Frank Morgan

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: A sensitive fireman believes he has no chance of ever winning the heart of a lovely astronomer owing to his large nose, and instead agrees to help a handsome colleague woo her, causing himself no end of heartache. Romantic comedy based on Cyrano de Bergerac, starring Steve Martin, Daryl Hannah, Rick Rossovich and Shelley Duvall

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two criminal brothers discover the orphanage where they were raised faces closure unless the nuns who run it can pay their tax bill, so the pair embark on an urgent mission to revive their old blues band to raise the money needed. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Aretha Franklin, James Brown, Ray Charles, Cab Calloway, Carrie Fisher, John Candy and John Lee Hooker

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: A disturbed and reclusive butterfly collector decides to extend his collection of exquisite specimens and captures a beautiful art student to add to his menagerie. Thriller, based on John Fowles novel, starring Terence Stamp, Samantha Eggar, Mona Washbourne and Maurice Dallimore

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Christmas on Duty
programme.desc: Former army rivals Blair and Josh must work Christmas duty together. When a snowstorm threatens holiday deliveries to the base, theyre forced to cooperate to save Christmas, despite their past conflicts. Romantic drama, starring Janel Parrish and Parker Young

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri
